Name: Freebie
About the game: Freebie is a casual game where you launch a ball against a paddle and hit a green surface. Be careful not to hit the red surfaces or you'll lose a life! Two Game Modes: -Normal mode -Epilepsy mode (This mode is unsuitable for those prone to epileptic seizures.)
